summary: In the summer of 2006, Sigur Rós returned home to play a series of free, unannounced concerts for the people of Iceland.
cast: Amiina|Hildur Arsaelsdottir|Jon Thor Birgisson|Orri P. Dyrason|Georg Holm|María Huldmarkan|Sólrún Sumarliðadóttir|Kjartan Sveinsson|Edda Rún Ólafsdóttir
title: Sigur Rós: Heima
